text: Ili pomolilsya by Allakhu, chtoby On pomog yemu osvobodit'sya ot khozhdeniya po rynkam, ili brosil by Allakh yemu sokrovishche s neba na raskhody, ili daroval by yemu sad, iz plodov kotorogo on by pitalsya.
